question.title: Sales by Day of the Week
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Orders (order_id int, customer_id int, order_date date, item_id varchar(30), quantity int)
Create table If Not Exists Items (item_id varchar(30), item_name varchar(30), item_category varchar(30))
